articles.description: Fifteen Premier League news conferences as domestic action returns, plus Sam Kerr's hat-trick helps Chelsea win in the Women's Champions League.
articles.title: Latest football news as Premier League returns

articles.description: Mercedes' George Russell sets the pace in a first practice session at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix in which half the cars did not have their regular drivers.
articles.title: Russell tops Abu Dhabi GP first practice

articles.description: Cameron Norrie needs a shock win over Novak Djokovic to keep alive Great Britain's hopes of beating Serbia and reaching the Davis Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Draper loss means Norrie must beat Djokovic at Davis Cup

articles.description: A Spanish prosecutor is seeking a prison term of nine years for ex-Brazil and Barcelona defender Dani Alves.
articles.title: Prosecutor seeks nine-year prison term for Alves

articles.description: The San Francisco 49ers round off the NFL's Thanksgiving triple-header with a 31-13 win at the Seattle Seahawks.
articles.title: 49ers, Cowboys & Packers claim Thanksgiving wins

articles.description: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton denies claims by Christian Horner he approached Red Bull about a move there earlier this year.
articles.title: Hamilton denies Horner's Red Bull approach claims

articles.description: BBC Sport explores how Rafael Benitez's return to Spanish football with Celta Vigo has - so far - been a major disappointment.
articles.title: How Benitez's triumphant homecoming turned sour

articles.description: BBC Sport takes at look at whether Harry Kane will top the goalscoring charts and become only England's second European Golden Shoe winner.
articles.title: Kane leading charge for Golden Shoe - can you name past winners?

articles.description: Brazil forward Rodrygo says he was racially abused on social media following a heated argument with Argentina captain Lionel Messi prior to their World Cup qualifier.
articles.title: 'Racists are always on duty' - Rodrygo

articles.description: Real Madrid want Erling Haaland and Kylian Mbappe, Wolves winger Pedro Neto in demand, Barcelona keen on Giovani Lo Celso, plus more
articles.title: Real Madrid chasing Haaland and Mbappe - Friday's gossip
